description: A Watch Face for Android Wear.3 patterns x 2 colors for a total of 6 WatchFaces to choose from.How to set your WatchFace:・Install via Google Play・Open the "Android Wear" Android Wear app on your mobile device・Tap the screen of your Wear device and hold to enter WatchFace selection screen, choose "Moon Watch Face"Supported devices:・Motorola Moto360・LG G Watch・Samsung Gear LIVE・LG G Watch R・SONY Smart Watch 3Not yet tested on:・ASUS ZenWatch
descriptionHTML:
A Watch Face for Android Wear.

3 patterns x 2 colors for a total of 6 WatchFaces to choose from.

How to set your WatchFace:
・Install via Google Play
・Open the "Android Wear" Android Wear app on your mobile device
・Tap the screen of your Wear device and hold to enter WatchFace selection screen, choose "Moon Watch Face"

Supported devices:
・Motorola Moto360
・LG G Watch
・Samsung Gear LIVE
・LG G Watch R
・SONY Smart Watch 3

Not yet tested on:
・ASUS ZenWatch
comments: Please try to place the settings inside android wear app Very good watchface, it is just a little annoying having in the app drawer the icon just for some minor settings. Keep up the good work! :)
Ok Please try to get the settings on the wear app. Also I never did see the phase change
Watch face list too cluttered There's no need to add a different watch face in the Android Wear app for every different configuration, it clutters the list.
Bleh! I can't pick the blue color moon you show. So I hate this app. I also don't see any other option other then 12hr button.
Love it but wish it had more options than just a 24h vs 12h clock
The app isn't working anymore it tells time but only in military. I had this face for 2 weeks now and it was running in 12 hour time periods. Please fix
